long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is intended only for students of Ottawa Middle School. It offers links to important websites such as the USD290 webpage, Skyward, and Destiny (active library list), Google Classroom, and a link to change your password. It is not a final product at the moment, as it will be advanced in style and use. If you have any suggestions, comments, or concerns, please email jamesharris@usd290.org.
